name: META — SHOUT
description:
CONTROLS:
WASD - movement
SPACE - to act/talk
GAMEPLAY:
The game is a parody of a horror game. Your task is to turn on three light bulbs. Find the keys to get to the switches. Communicate with the characters and avoid the monster.
CREDITS:
music - https://joshuuu.itch.io/short-loopable-background-music
